query.statement:
SELECT A.ARA , A.BSU , VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(#G_MANDT#,'CS115',A.ARA),'') ARA_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(#G_MANDT#,A.BSU),'') BSU_NM , VALUE(MON1, 0) AS MON1 , VALUE(MON2, 0) AS MON2 , VALUE(MON3, 0) AS MON3 FROM ( SELECT A.ARA , A.BSU , SUM(A.MON1) AS MON1 , SUM(A.MON2) AS MON2 , SUM(A.MON3) AS MON3 FROM (
-- O/HºÐ
SELECT A.CS131_ARA AS ARA , A.CS131_BSU AS BSU , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS131_YYM,5,2) = #M0# THEN SUM(DOUBLE(CS131_AMT) + CS131_HMT + CS131_DMT) ELSE 0 END MON1 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS131_YYM,5,2) = #M1# THEN SUM(DOUBLE(CS131_AMT) + CS131_HMT + CS131_DMT) ELSE 0 END MON2 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS131_YYM,5,2) = #M2# THEN SUM(DOUBLE(CS131_AMT) + CS131_HMT + CS131_DMT) ELSE 0 END MON3 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST131 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS131_YYM BETWEEN #YER#||#M0# AND #YER#||#M2#
AND A.CS131_MYB = '' AND SUBSTR(A.CS131_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G')
AND A.CS131_PJT = #PJT#
AND CS131_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS131_BSU = #BSU#
AND CS131_BPM = #BPM#
GROUP BY CS131_ARA, CS131_BSU, CS131_YYM
) A
GROUP BY ARA, BSU ) A ORDER BY A.ARA,A.BSU WITH UR
